interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Handcrafted Angled, Winged Eye Brush. One Touch Cat Eye - UNDONE BEAUTY Eye Shadow + Liner Brush. For Precise Outer Eye & Lash Line Definition. Soft & Durable Bristles. Vegan & Cruelty Free. Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: UNDONE BEAUTY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'UNDONE BEAUTY', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow', 'Material': 'synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.13 x 0.38 x 0.31 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.13 x 0.38 x 0.31 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'Item model number': '93157', 'UPC': '087327004720'} Review Text: Soo LOVELY & PERFECT (especially 4 beginners✌) 2 do ur crease/it takes the guess work out of it:)👍
P.S Alot of reviews said it didn't have 2 like the picture shows..I could tell there would only b one..it's showing a close-up of the brush:) Also they sent me a lovely card with 20% off my nxt purchace..I'm going 2 use it 2 get me another one/just 2 have 4 different colors👆 Review Title: LOVELY & VERY USEFUL👍 Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Cai Cosmetics Gel Eyeliner & Brush 2-Piece Set Stay All Day Waterproof (Brown) Cai Cosmetics New York {'Brand': 'Cai Cosmetics New York', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '844952182489'} It stays put..except 4 it dries out 2 fast..other than that..I would of gave it 5 🌟 Overallll greatttt product).. 48 Pairs Eyebrow Stencils Templates Shaping Eyebrow Stencils and 3 Pieces Eyebrow Razors Eyebrow Shavers for Women Makeup Tools Blulu {} Pretty neat & luv the ways 2 help U2 do ur brows these days👍 It helps very much:) Magnetic Eyeliner and Eyelash Kit Natural Look Waterproof and Smudge Resistant No Glue Easier To Use Than Traditional Magnetic Eyelashes ALICROWN HAIR {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 2.4 x 0.79 inches; 1.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '734830079171'} The only reason 4 four stars, is the band on the lashes seem a lil 2 thick, the lashes themselves seem normal & nice👌 Nice & ok😀 Handcrafted Angled, Winged Eye Brush. One Touch Cat Eye - UNDONE BEAUTY Eye Shadow + Liner Brush. For Precise Outer Eye & Lash Line Definition. Soft & Durable Bristles. Vegan & Cruelty Free. P.S Alot of reviews said it didn't have 2 like the picture shows..I could tell there would only b one..it's showing a close-up of the brush:) Also they sent me a lovely card with 20% off my nxt purchace..I'm going 2 use it 2 get me another one/just 2 have 4 different colors👆 LOVELY & VERY USEFUL👍
profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Product Preference:** The user remains passionate about cosmetics, particularly valuing tools that facilitate makeup application. Their recent purchase underscores a preference for functional and user-friendly items that simplify beauty routines. They focus on products that are not only practical but also visually appealing.

- **Rating Tendencies:** Their inclination to assign high ratings (notably 5 out of 5 stars in this case) demonstrates their appreciation for products that genuinely enhance their experience, aligning with their specific needs. This reflects a consistent tendency to prioritize effectiveness over minor imperfections.

- **Brand Affinity:** The user continues to engage with innovative brands that emphasize quality and functionality. Their enthusiasm for tools that improve makeup application methods showcases their quest for reliable and aesthetically pleasing products that align with their beauty standards.

- **Overall Behavior:** The user’s latest interaction highlights their thoughtful and supportive approach towards brands that deliver practical solutions. Their positive feedback emphasizes their satisfaction with products that exceed expectations, particularly for beginners. This ongoing exploration of new tools signifies a commitment to continuously refine their beauty regimen with effective and stylish solutions.
